channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CEO of $8 billion AI company says he’s ‘mind boggled’ that people think you can work 38 hours a week, have work-life balance, and be successful
item.description: Cerebras cofounder Andrew Feldman warned aspiring entrepreneurs they need to be working “every waking minute,” echoing the likes of Zoom CEO Eric Yuan...

item.title: New York Braces for Potential Flooding and Heavy Winds From Nor’easter
item.description: The storm has been moving up the East Coast since the weekend, dumping heavy rain and flooding roads on its way toward New England.

item.title: Home Depot founder Arthur Blank donates $50 million to Atlanta’s historically Black colleges and universities via foundation
item.description: The billionaire has committed to giving at least half his wealth away via the Giving Pledge and his family foundation has donated over $1.5 billion to...

item.title: China calls for Trump to drop 100% tariff threat, urges U.S. to ‘promptly correct its erroneous practices’
item.description: Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesman Lin Jian said "China will certainly take resolute measures to safeguard its legitimate rights and interests.”

item.title: Macron Urges Stability Despite Calls for Government Ouster in France

item.title: ‘It is very important to vindicate her’: Mexico’s president want to reclaim the story of Malinche, 16th century translator for the conquistadors
item.description: Mexico kicks off cultural events dedicated to Malinche with her pre-Hispanic name, Malintzin, on the anniversary of Christopher Columbus' arrival.

item.title: When I Look at Zohran Mamdani, Here’s What I See
item.description: What does it means to be a “good” Muslim in America?

item.title: The Release of Israeli Hostages and Palestinian Prisoners in Photos and Videos
item.description: Twenty living hostages were freed by Hamas on Monday under the cease-fire deal, and Israel released nearly 2,000 Palestinian prisoners.

item.title: More Than 40 People Killed in Bus Crash in South Africa
item.description: The bus was carrying passengers from Zimbabwe and Malawi who were traveling back to their home countries.
